testimonies.text: Logo created a strong app that functions well and is easy to manage. The app has gotten great feedback and is impressive for a quickly developed MVP.
testimonies.name: Valentina Vincent, CEO & Founder

testimonies.text: Logo  kicked off out project running a Design Sprint. That helped us validate our ideas, think of solutions, build a prototype and test it with real users very fast. After that they began working on the design of two high quality apps that are attractive and very easy to use and understand.
testimonies.name: Daniel Gr√°tacos, CTO at Silence

testimonies.text: They're very committed, even when we ask them to travel or work long hours. They've become real thought partners to us, instead of being just developers who execute what they're told. Also, they're all critical thinkers, which we found very valuable.
testimonies.name: Lauren Braun, Head of Product

midCards.title: Naked
midCards.cardContent: We worked on Product Strategy and Product Development with a Silicon Valley startup that raised a $14M Series A producing and selling the world's first 3D home body scanner.

midCards.title: Silence
midCards.cardContent: Silence is a personal electric scooter free of charging points. We ran a Design Sprint and worked on UX, UI and Strategy with their team.

midCards.title: Samsung
midCards.cardContent: We worked with Samsung designing and developing the web for their annual conference for developers and digital product creators. UX, UI, development and a lot of user testing.

midCards.title: Period Gold
midCards.cardContent: Period Gold is a Silicon Valley startup for women who are looking for a holistic understanding of their menstrual cycle. We ran a Design Sprint to define the app's features and worked on UX, UI and strategy.

midCards.title: Hobnob
midCards.cardContent: An app that connects travelers based on compatibility questions, interests and itineraries.

midCards.title: Jampp
midCards.cardContent: A video creation tool for the growth platform of choice for on-demand apps worldwide.

midCards.title: Plevo
midCards.cardContent: A web for a series of innovative and techie travel pieces.

midCards.title: Endurance
midCards.cardContent: We worked on the branding and built the web for the world's first carbon-neutral online conference on triathlon.

midCards.title: Sporty
midCards.cardContent: We worked on the branding and built the web for the world's first carbon-neutral online conference on sports.

miniCards.title: Women in Tech: Marga Martinez Picornell
Lean UX and Design Sprint changed product design for ever
Speculative Design: An alternative reading to reality
